Tests inline values rendering in the sources panel.

[ 9]       var a = { k: 1 }; 	
[10]       var b = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]; 	
[11]       var c = new Array(100); c[10] = 1; 	
[12]       a.k = 2; 	
[13]       a.l = window; 	
[14]       b[1]++; 	
[15]       b[2] = document.body; 	
[16]   }
